problem.p: Just to see if you were listening ... and for me to see what quizzes in edX are like!
How many tertary students were there worldwide in 2010?

choicegroup.label: Is a graded quiz or assignment a good idea?
choicegroup.choice: 100 million Not bad, that is the current number of new tertiary students each year.
180 million Yay, that is right, but it is rising fast!
260 million Hey, you are ahead of your time; that is the expected number by 2025.
360 million Sorry, this is one of those annoying distractors meant to make you think 260 is right. I hope you aren't cruel like this to your students.
